price: Nirudishieni! Akaanza kuwapapasa miguu na shingo.
arabic: رُدُّوهَا عَلَيَّۖ فَطَفِقَ مَسۡحَۢا بِٱلسُّوقِ وَٱلۡأَعۡنَاقِ
footnotes: Akaamrisha warudishwe tena kwake apate kujua hali yao. Akaingia kuwapapasa miundi ya miguu yao na shingo zao kwa upole na mapenzi juu yao.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: ruddūhā ʿalayya faṭafiqa masḥan bil-sūqi wal-aʿnāqi
